sentences.english: Do not seek Solomon's empire without the seal of belief.
sentences.chinese: 沒有信仰之印，請別尋找蘇萊曼帝國。

sentences.english: It is reported that Suleiman had promised to Israel for its "sweeping Sinai mountains."
sentences.chinese: 據悉，蘇萊曼曾向以色列許諾要爲其“清掃西奈山”。

sentences.english: Vice-president Omar Suleiman said a military council will run the affairs of the Arab world's most populous nation.
sentences.chinese: 副總統蘇萊曼稱，軍事委員會將暫時處理國事。

sentences.english: Mr Suleiman has warned of a coup if constitutional reforms fail.
sentences.chinese: 主席蘇萊曼曾警告說，如果憲法改革政變失敗。
